command.name: ncbi-blastn-plus
command.arg: -query $;I_FILE_PATH$; -db $;DATABASE_PATH$; -evalue $;EXPECT$; -word_size $;WORDSIZE$; -max_target_seqs $;MAX_TARGET_SEQS$; -outfmt "6 qseqid qlen sseqid salltitles qstart qend sstart send pident ppos score bitscore slen evalue" -out $;OUTPUT_DIRECTORY$;/$;ITERATOR_NAME$;/g$;GROUP_NUMBER$;/$;I_FILE_BASE$;.$;COMPONENT_NAME$;.btab
